text.style: font-size:40px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;line-height:125%;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;font-family:'文泉驛微米黑';-inkscape-font-specification:'文泉驛微米黑'
